pages.text: Upon defeating the Ur-Ghast, you will be imbued with the fiery strength needed to endure the frigid cold of the Snowy Forest, where you will find the yetis in their lair.

$(br2)$(br)The Alpha Yeti is immensely powerful and cannot be defeated without the strength given by the defeat of the Ur-Ghast. The smaller yetis that live with him in the lair will support him in battle.
